flawed_nl_solution:
Andy weighed 156 + 36 = <<156+36=193>>193 pounds after growing taller.
An eighth of his weight is 1/8 x 193 = <<1/8*193=193/8>>193/8 pounds.
Over the next 3 months, Andy lost 193/8 x 3 = <<193/8*3=579/8>>579/8 pounds.
He now weighs 193 - 579/8 = <<193-579/8=965/8>>965/8 pounds.
Andy weighs 156 - 965/8 = <<156-965/8=283/8>>283/8 pounds less than at the beginning of the year.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 192, not 193. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
